section.title: Jakub Gavlas
section.para: My task in this group project - survey management system - was to create basic Desktop interface for creating new surveys and also editing already existing ones.

section.title: My contribution
section.para: Together with Peter Petkanic and Martin Galik we did our best to create well sctructured and good functioning application with user friendly interface.
I coded some functionality of jPanelQuestion.java and created table models such as SurveyTableModel.java, QuestionTableModel.java.

section.title: tableModels
section.para: This classes are used for working with jTables in jPanelMain.java, jPanelSurvey.java, jPanelQuestion.java. They provide

section.title: jPanelQuestion.java
section.para: This class is used for listing, creating and editing of answers of selected Question. Question's text can be changed here aswell.

section.title: User Interface
section.para: After launching application you can see already existing surveys and you can choose one to edit it or create brand new one. After choosing survey next window is opened in which user chooses from Questions of that which one to edit or create a new one. Survey's title and description can changed here. Next window shows that question's answers and type of question. Answers can be created or edited here.
